title: Portfolio Website
description: Modern React portfolio showcasing UX development skills with responsive design and contact form integration.

title: Apple Music Electron
description: Native desktop wrapper for Apple Music built with Electron, providing a dedicated desktop experience with system integration and keyboard shortcuts.

title: KaraokeTube
description: Real-time karaoke app with synchronized lyric playback and multi-user queues. Responsive and interactive UI.

title: NYT Code Redeemer
description: Firefox extension that automatically redeems library codes for New York Times subscriptions.

title: Books-Unlimited
description: Class project demonstrating web development fundamentals - a book catalog with search, filtering, and dynamic content rendering.

title: Discord-M1
description: M1-native Electron client for Discord, improving performance on Apple Silicon Macs before official support.
